item.title: Fly tips in Wellington Gardens, 4th February
item.description:
Outside no 64: old suitcase Outside nos 38-40: several large cardboard boxes with assorted rubbish inside. This property has no blue top recycling bins and items proper to such appear on the pavement outside regularly.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wellington Gardens, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet
